bibl.title: "Thou Shalt Not Kill a Tree": Greek, Manichaean and Indian Tales.
bibl.note: I. Source Criticism - An Exercise in Frustration. - II. Tree-Murder in Manichaeism. - III. Tree Souls and Animism. - IV. Mani in India. - V. Aretalogical Structure and Motifs. - VI. From Aretalogy to Paradoxography.
bibl.seg: Henrichs Albert, "Thou Shalt Not Kill a Tree": Greek, Manichaean and Indian Tales.

I. Source Criticism - An Exercise in Frustration. - II. Tree-Murder in Manichaeism. - III. Tree Souls and Animism. - IV. Mani in India. - V. Aretalogical Structure and Motifs. - VI. From Aretalogy to Paradoxography.
